name: Win Rate: 60%!
effect: If you have a Tamer in play, you may use this Option card without meeting its color requirements.[Main] The next time one of your Digimon digivolves this turn, you may trash 1 Digimon card in your hand of the same color as the digivolving Digimon to reduce the memory cost of the digivolution by 4.
security_effect: [Security] Add this card to its owner's hand.
